title: Flat File All Orders Data Reports (by last update)
description: Flat File All Orders Data by Last Update Date General Reports

amazon-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon order.

merchant-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the merchant's order.

purchase-date.description: The date and time of the order purchase.

last-updated-date.description: The date and time of the last update to the order.

fulfillment-channel.description: The channel through which the order was fulfilled.

sales-channel.description: The channel through which the sale was made.

order-channel.description: The channel through which the order was placed.

ship-service-level.description: The service level of the shipping method.

product-name.description: The name of the product in the order.

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit for the product.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number for the product.

item-status.description: The status of the item in the order.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in the order.

currency.description: The currency used in the order transaction.

item-price.description: The price of the item in the order.

item-tax.description: The tax applied to the item.

shipping-price.description: The price of shipping for the order.

gift-wrap-price.description: The price of gift wrapping for the order.

gift-wrap-tax.description: The tax applied to gift wrapping.

item-promotion-discount.description: The discount applied to the item.

ship-promotion-discount.description: The discount applied to the shipping.

ship-city.description: The city to which the order is being shipped.

ship-state.description: The state to which the order is being shipped.

ship-postal-code.description: The postal code of the shipping address.

ship-country.description: The country to which the order is being shipped.

promotion-ids.description: The IDs of any promotions applied to the order.

cpf.description: The taxpayer identification number for the customer.

is-business-order.description: Indicates if the order is a business order.

signature-confirmation-recommended.description: Indicates if signature confirmation is recommended.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data update.
